attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I AM OPENING THIS PETITION BECAUSE AS WE ALL KNOW THERE HAVE BEEN  A VAST RISE IN TEENAGE MURDERS IN THE UK THESE PAST FEW MONTHS BECAUSE YOUNG PEOPLE DONT HAVE ANY WHERE TO GO ACEEPT TO GANGS.
THE GOVERMENT NEEDs TO GIVE MORE FUNDING FOR YOUTH CENTERES TO BE BUILT AND TO STAY OPEN.

rejection.details: Please re-write in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
